text: Hey team, looking to work with Andrew Clark for Pizza Hut. Budget is approx $8,771 - need 3 x Instagram story, 3 x Lifestyle photography, 1 x Lifestyle photography, 2 x 60-second YouTube video, 1 x Facebook post. 4 weeks exclusivity, 2 month engagement. Usage: 10 months. Start date: December 2025. no worries
